mapper.insert: insert into ED_INTERFACE_COUNT (PK_ID, APP_ID, REQ_USER, REQ_TIME, REQ_PARAM) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reqParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PK_ID, APP_ID, REQ_USER, REQ_TIME, REQ_PARAM from ED_INTERFACE_COUNT
